___correlation_type.description: The correlation type for this sample.

___effective_time_frame.description: The time frame when this sample occurred. When the HKSample `startDate` and `endDate` values are different, we recommend using the `time_interval` time frame property, and when they are the same, we recommend using the `date_time` time frame property.

references.description: The reference for the HKMetadataKeyFoodType metadata key that should be included with correlation samples of type HKCorrelationTypeIdentifierFood.

___metadata.description: An array of extra information describing this sample.

allOf.description: The HealthKit `objects` array is split into `quantity_samples` and `category_samples` to simplify deserialization.

___quantity_samples.description: An array of the quantity samples in this correlation.

___category_samples.description: An array of the category samples in this correlation.

description: An Apple HealthKit correlation sample that represents data using multiple quantity and category samples.
